speaker: Echo Caverns
lines: You enter damp caverns that smell of iron and old fires.
Your footfalls echo along the passage.
Scratch-marks run at knee height along the limestone.
Calcite curtains hang from the ceiling and drip.
Charcoal antlers mark a wall where frost blooms.
A draft pushes back from deeper in.

choices.text: Follow the scratch-marks into a narrow runnel.
Take the painted passage where sigils bloom with frost.
